text:
e="preserve">Jack Blessing (July 29, 1951 – November 14, 2017) was an American actor. He was known for his roles as MacGillicuddy on "Moonlighting" and as Jack Powers in the sitcom "George Lopez". He also had a role as Mr. Donner in the television series "The Naked Truth". He was born in Baltimore, Maryland.
Blessing died of pancreatic cancer at his home in Chatsworth, California on November 14, 2017 at the age of 66.
